values:
Well, I've offically moved in with 4 guys and I'm beginning to think this might have been a mistake- or at least an adventrue too big for my britches. Its not that they are dirty or anything...they just live in this guns-weapons-cars-girls-boobs world all their own...I have zero contribution to discussions about turbos or boobs or champ car races...bleck...

Work is going very well. I'm enjoyin my job a lot but not a lot of off time lately. 

Still trying to keep you my tan. My freckles look great this year- if that is even possible.

L needs to get his car fixed because its driving me nuts. I swear something else breaks on it every other day. No good.

Shit Waffle.

*God Bless and I hope everyone is doing well*

Can you believe summer is already 1/2 way through?? I know-hardly something any of us want to be thinking about right now...but still...wow!

So much has been happening. My world has become transformed by so many amazing things since I last wrote:

-I have 'refound' the Lord and am experiencing love and joy like I never have before.
-I'm peeling from a splendid sunburn.
-I've had my 1st slice of summer Lou Malnati's.
-I found out I have biceps...there are pretty big muscles in my arms. I'm a beast.
-I'm in the process of landing a great job after a long dry spell.
-My bank account is practically overflowing!!
-I'm content and at peace. Really at peace.
-I have realized God's purpose for me on this earth.

Today our pastor spoke about celebrating in the midst of our enemies. We have to celebrate break bread and be joyous IN THE MIDST of the bad; not try to get rid of it ourselves and THEN bring Jesus into our lives. What a great thought! We don't have to suffer! We weren't made to suffer! We can conquer all with the Lord and BE JOYOUS IN THE MIDST. Doesn't that put a smile on your face!? :)

I'm enjoying my summer downtime. I'm enjoying my time alone...although I do wish I hung out with more people but it just seems we can't get schedules to correspond. All will come together-I have no worries! 

I diggin' the smiley faces today :)

Alright, I'm off to the gym to work off some energy! WHOOOOOOOOOooooo. I never knew running could be so relaxing but I'm really gettin' into it. 

Luke 6:27
But I say onto you which hear, Love your enemies, do good to them which hate you.

Amen

Good lord, I have been having REALLLLLLLLLLY weird dreams...the night before last I married an ex and then another boyfriend came and shot him at our wedding. Last night I was in an undisclosed town with a really big gun targeting this person who was so fat she couldn't fit through a door....why would I snipe a person who is that big??! *Random*

Beyond that I'm back in Atown for a bit. Soaking up some sun (and rain apparently) and doing some laundry. L is holding down the fort at school...its not like he's suffering-he hangs out with my bro or his car buddies in the hookah room! SEXY

Ah yes! We finally have a hookah room! My bro picked up a bangin' 4 hose for $100, we brought in the old steamer trunk that was in my room, a shit load of pillows, and the pope lamp (don't ask-too long to tell) and the room is awsome. Its the perfect size for 4 or 5 people to chill.

Meh, back to some writings. I've decided to jump on the scholarship wagon this year and see what I can make of it. If all I have to do to get money is fill out forms and write then I'm in, friends!

The 4 of us (Core, Clens, Lars, and I) are all going to go camping in Indiana the end of June!! I'm SOOOOOOOOOOOOOO excited! Its going to be amazing. It takes me back to The Taste last year!! LMAO!! ;) 

Cheeky
HAPPY BIRTHDAY MAGGIE!!!

Its the home stretch....four more days...I will barely make it. ***BLECK***

I went to opera on Friday night....ummm....it was a bit too avant-garde for me....the entire set was giant bathroom-tiled Russian nesting dolls...and the opera was in German about Spainards stuck in Turkey...yeah....at least the pit was amazing. God bless Jane Glover!!

Ma came up Saturday and we got tipsy playing Yatzee. I know YATZEE. But hey, there is very little to pass the time in Deplab. We went to Chris' for dinner and finished out the night here doing hookah. Chris just bought a new one...I'll load up pics once I figure out how to get them from my camera to my computer. Yum.

I have this huge knot right in the middle of my shoudler blades...its killing me. I can't turn or bend...I ahve to go to the chiraopractor... :(

I went to a study group for my honors class yesterday....these people analyze more than I do!! that's RIDICULOUS!!!! These questions are lenghty but obviously our prof doesn't want an exhaustive answer if we have to get through 8 of them....jeez people....just get in, answer the shit, and GET OUT!!

Its cloudy today which is a good thing. If not, I'd be outsidde doing nothing productive...bleck..

I've had my new job for 3 days now and I'm already looking for a new one...I have applied several other places so its all good....

I still can't believe summer is right around the corner!! It sneaks up on you really quickly when you're in Uni....nuts!

Bleck...alright...I gotta do something about my back... :(

What a wonderful weekend.

Friday night we (L, Chris, and I) all went out to a bon fire at Jeremy's (aka Jebidiah) house. Ended tipsy and wandering around Geneva at 3am. Its eerie. 

Saturday consisted of going home for a bike and some Chinese food and then rendez-vous at my bro's for another night of crazies. Ash came up and we had a blast. Probably the 1st time after 4 years she has gone out drinkin' and boy could you tell! She was plastered after 2 beers and by the time we made it to Shama-llama-dingdong (The renamed frat by a drunk yours truly because I can't remember greek letters to save my left eye) she was so far gone we were dancing to bad rap and telling everyone we were MILFs. *Yum*

And now I'm here attempting to break my slew of hangoverness with a good string of homework. FUN! My last big hurdle before classes end is a research paper due in a week.

I had an interview on Friday but nothing has panned out yet. Still jobless. I'm trying not to get stressed about this summer...I've decided to start the "Support a College Education" Fund via Ebay. Everything's going. Everything. Everything you never knew you wanted but will when I'm through with you! I'll keep you posted on how that account comes along. It'll be fun. :)

Alright, back to my paper and scholarship stuff. We'll see how that pans out.

*cheers*

I've realized after a year of hurt and confusion that you just can't handle being friends. You don't want to work at it. You are perfectly happy throwing away a wonderful friendship because of jealousy. If its not jealousy, then I don't know what it is because you feel are too high and mighty to explain it to me...to work things out...you never wanted to stay friends because if you did you never would've treated me the way you did. You never would've assumed that it was over. You made that decision kid, not me. You got mad becuase I found someone and that meant you lost time. You weren't there for me when I needed you. You didn't care to be.

I'm sure you say the exact same things about me. I'm sure you've talked me up to your friends to be the biggest bitch of the west. I'm ok with that because I know who wrote the apology letters and tried to talk and invited you to a party that wasn't even mine and TALKED to you when you pretended I didn't exist. 

I wish it could've all been different. I wish we were still friends and you could accept my apology for whatever the hell I did that was so severe as to end a friendship. But I've realized after a year of having no friends and crying and being hurt by you that I can't allow this anymore. I can't let you ruin my life anymore. 

I've said it a million times and I'll say it one more time: I can't fix it unless I know. You never clued me in. You never wanted to clue me in. You wanted to be the victim of some nameless crime. 

I extend one last apology and accept yours, whether you offer it or not.

I wish you all the best. Life is too short to harbour these feelings that slowly eat you inside out. I want to be friends, I'll always want to be friends becuase I miss that friendship. I swear I've never laughed so hard as when we were friends.

I'm sorry. Maybe one day we can talk. But that day doesn't seem to be in the near furture, at least from your end.

All the best-Good bye.

I'm supposed to be writing a speech I have to deliver tonight but I just stopped caring...after I finish that project tonight I have a research paper to type up, finals, and then I'm done.

I still can't find a job. I'm freakin' out...I really don't want to head home for the summer but that's beginning to look like my only option. I'm not thrilled about this.

I had the weirdest dream EVER. I'm dating this guy from one of my classes (cute-smart-funny...one of those) and I'm going to his apartment to hang out but you hve to climb over this roof to get there...really high up...I freak out...then I fall but I fall right into his room... THHHEEENNN we're at a ball and I'm wearing one of those massive old-school ball gowns (the ones that no one gets to wear for real anymore BUT they should!) and he's looking great...we start to dance (he can dance amazingly!) and then my teacher cuts in.....needless to say it was random...but now I woke up thinking about this guy..and I really wonder if he is that funny or he is that smart...you know what I mean? Sometimes your dreams are right on...

Life is getting complicated. Yeah, it comes with the territory but nevertheless I'm not diggin' it...at least its sunny outside.

I feel like a massive storm is going to come in and rock my world...in a bad way...

I dig Wednesdays if for no other reason than I don't have to be productive until 6pm. NIIIIICCCEEE.

It is wonderful outside. 69 degrees. A tiny breeze. Its noon but it still looks like the sun is rising...random but true.

I just checked my bank account...$16.00. Oh no, not $160.00.....SIXTEEN......that is what I get for not having a job since Feb...but life shall go on...

I tired doing yoga this morning to relax. I have to slow down or I'm going to have an ulser by the time I'm 22. I've been so worked up the past couple of nights that I can't sleep...I just lay in bed and feel my eyes bulge out of my head to my heartbeat.

I have to give a speech about the importance of voting...I have 8 mins to convince an entire generation that voting is important...oh lord...

I'm very ready for this semester to be OVER. Its all become so hectic that I really don't even know what's going on anymore...honestly...

Easter is this weekend. I'm THRILLED! I love Easter!! :) It is truly one of my favs....the church service, good weather, left overs (see what you focus on when you're in college?!?)...amazing! It will be nice to have a holiday.

Alright, I'm back to the grinding stone but becuase its so nice out today I'll do it with a SMILE. ;-)

Friday night. Drunk in the living room on the pull out bed...poor Flush looked like he was high...watching late night Food Network (yes, there is such a thing!)...makin' out...one thing led to another (loud) thing...AND WE GOT CAUGHT!!! lmao! oh yes, pure staring involved there!!! I loved it. Does that make me an exhibionist? oops! lol

Beyond that the weather has taken a sunny turn so I'll run with it. I've been getting back into shape and I must say that I have found abs in places I never thought possible. Yummy.

About 5 more weeks until the end of the semester. As soon as that may sound its not soon enough for me! Too many papers-tests-projects-speeches between now and then. Bleck. 

Anyone want to go on a cruise? This is my latest plan for Spring Break next year....anyone in? From what I've looked at a week aboard is only about $1,200 and that includes food, room, and FUN!! niiiceeee Anyone ever taken one and have any stories/advice?

I'm eating day old pizza (its still delicious, don't let me fool ya) and thinking about crazy lesbians. I've decided there are such a thing....

Alright, off for a run! *Kisses*

Woooo! Loving life today! 

Its really neat to play that "where was I a year ago" game...I've come out on top. I've cut a lot of the fat/drama out of my life which allows for so much more breathing space. I've prioritized. I've learned alot. I've finally been back to Medival Times, played in the snow, and seen Dame Edna. I drank too much again at New Years but loved every second of it. I've learned to be quieter. I have a posse. I have a new computer. I've loved, really really loved. I'm learning to love in ways that I never thought possible. I'm finally in school. I'm out on my own. I'm 20. I've never laughed as hard as I have this past year. I'm so blessed.

I'm enjoying college more because I'm at the point where I'm finally stuck in it. I have a routine and I am enjoying it. Its a neat change. For the first time in a long time I'm acutally content. 

Life is just too short to take everything seriously. Like art. Who takes art so seriously that they crack a hernia, ya know? 

Smile and be happy! Life is just too damn short. And if ya can't do that then get the hell out! lol

I'm excited for a fun-filled summer of tanning, work, road trips, and the beach with everyone. It'll be cool to have everyone that was at the party last weekend together to go camping and partying. I'm excited for the semester to break so I can have a bit of a breather before next year's load.

WHOOOOO! Things are seriously falling into place! How amazing is that?! ;)

Life looks to be shaping up (even if I seriously hate Mondays these days)

-L & I are hopefully heading back to Malaysia next summer to see my host families and for me to wrap up some intensive arabic before heading to Cairo.

-The plan is that I'm going to go to Cairo for a semester to study advanced arabic. It should be an absoluetly amazing experience. C'mon! Pyramids...the nile....great food...exotic men! ;) 

-Classes are ridiculous. Coms100 is a joke. We have to do 5-7 minute informative speeches...I swear we did all this in high school!!

-Spring Break is next week! WHOOOO. Plans are to do a whole lot of nothing at home. OH! And go into the city for St. Patty's Day to see Dame Edna with DJ. FABULOUS!

Have to blow dry my hair. 2 shakes.

oh! Maggie & Fish! I totally bought Girl Scout cookies the other day it took me back, old school! Only they didn't have tagalongs...

It snowded hard core yesterday. Bleck. Saturday was beautiful-you could smell the ground again and everything...and then it snows 3 inches on Sunday. Mutha Nature is a big tease.

As you can tell be now I'm procrastinating about writing my outline for Coms. I'd rather chew glass by this point- seriously. My other classes aren't that bad. We're reading detective stories in English (Poirot all the way!), Locke in my 2 political philosophy classes, and Islam in SEA in the Intro to South East Asian studies class. Cheers to that!

I'm so tired these days. I become physically tired taking a shower. Everyone says its because I sleep too much but that's a GROGGY tired...like..you just can't get moving. This is the "I've worked all day and am ready to drop" tired. I'm terrified I have mono...

Listening to lots of Queen lately. I have more in common with a gay man than most people on this planet...are we surprised at this? I think not.

Alright, I'll go do something productive...I swear...

I'm sick as a dog today. I don't know what I did or waht I ate or who I kissed to end up feeling this crappy....its one of those I-just-got-hit-by-a-truck-and-then-he-backed-up-on-me-for-more kinda flus. I'm slowly dying. Bleck.

L took me to Medieval Times for Valentine's Day/10th Anniversary. We were the green team and although our knight lost he looked like Apolo Anton Ohno and we were referred to as the "wretches and wenches". Trust me, I'm ALLLL in when there are wenches involved.

Turned in a paper for my honors class yesterday. I think it wsa supposed to be a serious dry affair but mine ended up to be a four page commnentary about a boxing match between Plato and Aristotle. At least he can't fault me for being boring.

Classes are brutal this semester. I don't know what it is, but I can't seem to get into the swing of 'em. Honestly, I feel inadequate this semester. What I knew or at least THOUGHT I knew is gone so now I'm just wingin' it. I feel like everyone else knows something I don't...I just pray I can mantain my GPA.

Have an offer to go to the University of Cairo to study Arabic...I might jump on that considering it would be fully paid for....we'll see how I play my cards...

Alright, I might as well sit here and start to do some research for my comms speech. Bleck. I'm still dying.....doesn't it suck to be sick alone?? :-(

It has begun as a beautiful Valentine's Day because I have THE best Valentine in the land! ;)

I need to get on my soapbox for one moment and express a bit of anger:

The number one trait that is truly ridiculous in a TWENTY YEAR OLD is immaturity. I'm talkin' about the whining, can't discuss issues with people, awkward, snide remarks behind the back, BITCHY attitudes. YOu all know what I'm talking about here because we all have at least one in our lives. 

I feel better. You can grow out of immaturity but you can't grow out of being a bitch. IT really has to suck to be you. There are no two ways around that one, buddy.

On a happier note, I sign the lease for my place in the Fall this upcoming week. I'll be really sad to leave Ceebs behind because we've become really close. 

Class time.

I just quit my job. I've had it up to my neck and yet another weekend of ball busting to be yelled at by the owner on Monday. We'll see if the store is even afloat after 6 weeks.....

I'm over the moon about the whole thing! At least I'll be open every weekend for a while now! ;)

Classes are in full swing and I have a full round of testing these next 10 days.

Valentine's Day is tomorrow. It is going to be magnificent. For once in my life, I have a valentine. *SCORE*

The Vice president shot a man while quail hunting....how many people can say that they've resemble a bird so well that they were shot?

Plato & Aristotle were really just two drunken crazy men. I think it is going to take a lot to convince me otherwise.

Alright- just wanted to fill the world in! 

Anyone following the Olympics!!? How about half-piper Shawn White? WHOOOOOO! And the Chinese pair skaters with the super awesome coach! Love it! I eat this shit up!

Classes are under way. Not a bad selection this semester but I'm in Dusable more than I'm home...

This guy really intrigues me but I don't even think he knows I'm alive. I try not to stare but i'm so good at it... 

Glenn's class is already overwhelming. The kids in his class are good...really good....

We had an all out blizzard Friday night and MB was in town....so random to see him again but glad to know all is well in his world.

I feel like there is something bubbling just beneath the surface here and I don't know how to cope with it. Whatever it is, it is tiring me out.

9 months here and gone...will we make it another 9??? I am doubting it at this point...I don't even want to put forth the effort because its all just become too much.

And for the first time in my life I will admit I am officially 100% in over my head.

Lordy! What a break!

My last 8 hours of work are tomorrow and then I head back......

Made the Dean's List...not really sure what that means but it sounds important! ;)

I saw A LOT of really random West people this break and LOVED it! 
Kisses to:
Rosie- my new found RockyWhore girl. 
Ren-my WIU crazy partner in crime. 
Wes & Vickie- awesome people! 
Johann-DON'T LEAVE ME....or at least make sure to send me a postcard!! 

I missed catching up with some people but sometimes life gets in the way of our plans. Also met up with some people I'd never really care to see again....crying/puking= AWKWARD!!

I just worked out. I feel as if my butt has moved northward....

I'm excited for classes on Tues even though I don't even remember what class I start with...meh....happens....ready to be challenged again by Glenn. Also ready to go back up and see David and company for a fun "WE'RE ALL HOME!" party.

I cleaned this morning! L's alternator crapped out so I ended up driving to go pick him up on the side of the road...always an adventure in snow that's coming down SIDE-WAYS!! One 60 and the next a blizzard. Oh menopausal mother nature. 

Mr. 88 bought me acrylic nails because mine were splitting so bad they were bleeding...the sound they make on the keyboard is horrific!!!! We're still going strong although we've had a few hiccups...relationships are work....

I'm just humming along these days...no inner turmoil...nothing dramatic or time consumingly boring...just enjoying! I'd love to say I'm so over the drama and all the people that bring it into my life but I refuse to jinx it.

;) Too happy for words these days. I feel like my life is taking shape.

Mmmm Mmm Mmm!! I'm loving break this year!!! All I really HAVE to do is stand around at work a few hours a day but that leaves me a lot of time to hang out!! :D
   Christmas was sandwiched between work days this year so it went by very quickly. I got some awesome stuff...and some ebay fodder...lol.
   My circle O' friends has enlarged to a healthier size over break. And with the living suitation for next year I'm positive it will grow even more!! WHOOOOOO
    Grades came in and I pulled my A's. I almost feel bad because I really only worked in one class. I put myself in a few more 200 and 300 level classes for spring so we'll see....plus I have a KICKASS schedule! My 1st class of the week is Monday at 5pm and my last on Thursday ends at 4.45pm. Isn't that awesome?!?!?!??!?!
    Mr. 88 and I are doing well. We've been bouncing between my place and DePlab (for a lil R&R this break). Its a little stressful but its SO worth it.
    The family is already making plans for Vegas!! WHOOOO! When each of us turns 21 my parents take us to Vegas! it'll be my 21st ON Oct 21st (A GOLDEN BIRTHDAY!! SWEET ASS!!!) and we're going for a weekend again! Mr. 88 shall be accompaning us (SCORE!!) honestly, more at my dad's and bro's requesst than mine if you can imagine!!!!!!! I think they love him more than I do! ;) We'll be at the Riveria again, I'm sure and I'll get to gamble away my play money everday!! WHOOOOOO ;) Then C, Mr.88, and I (probably with Clennors-no gettin outta this one!!) are going to go back over Spring Break or summer break!! YEAH BUDDY!!! Tell me that wouldn't be awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!
    Inventory at the store is this week but it shouldn't be that bad because everyne will be there and we have pretty much sold the store empty! that night we're going to party hardy at C's BYOB new Year's shin-dig! I am SO freaking excited. I'm dancing my ass off- no questions about it.
    Alright, I'm gonna blow dry my hair and get ready for work!

In the words of my fav. roomie: I LOVE LIFE!!! ;)

I hate cleaning, I really do. I don't think I'll ever like it.

Reading a lot of Tocqueville and CS Lewis lately. Morality (and lack thereof) is on the plate this month. Lots of good conversation with my honors professor about it all. He's the only person on this campus that I regularly talk to. That's sad.

Thinking about transfering to a school better suited to me. We'll see what I can find. 

Its getting cold. 

Thanksgiving is here. Holy shit. Where has this year gone? I swear I just came home from my birthday night in Macomb LAST NIGHT! Crazy.

Work is work....its money and that's all that matters.

My pols260 term paper is one of the best I've ever written...we'll see if my teacher agrees.

Everyone is coming home for break. I feel like I've lost some part of myself and seeing these kids, especially J, will help me regain what I've lost.

Madonna is wearing nude nylons in HUNG UP...I don't know how to feel about that beyond the fact she looks ridiculous.

Looking back I feel like I haven't accomplished anything this year.....bleck...pols time.

12 reasons why gay people should not be allowed to get married

1. Homosexuality is not natural, much like eyeglasses, polyester, and birth control. 

2. Heterosexual marriages are valid because they produce children. Infertile couples and old people can't legally get married because the world needs more children. 

3. Obviously, gay parents will raise gay children, since straight parents only raise straight children. 

4. Straight marriage will be less meaningful if Gay marriage is allowed, since Britney Spears' 55-hour just-for-fun marriage was meaningful. 

5. Heterosexual marriage has been around a long time and hasn't changed at all; women are property, blacks can't marry whites, and divorce is illegal. 

6. Gay marriage should be decided by people, not the courts, because the majority-elected legislatures, not courts, have historically protected the rights of the minorities. 

7. Gay marriage is not supported by religion. In a theocracy like ours, the values of one religion are imposed on the entire country. That's why we have only one religion in America. 

8. Gay marriage will encourage people to be gay, in the same way that hanging around tall people will make you tall. 

9. Legalizing gay marriage will open the door to all kinds of crazy behavior. People may even wish to marry their pets because a dog has legal standing and can sign a marriage contract. 

10. Children can never succeed without a male and a female role model at home. That's why single parents are forbidden to raise children. 

11. Gay marriage will change the foundation of society. Heterosexual marriage has been around for a long time, and we could never adapt to new social norms because we haven't adapted to things like cars or a longer lifespan. 

12. Civil unions, providing most of the same benefits as marriage with a different name are better, because a "separate but equal" institution is always constitutional. Separate schools for African-Americans worked just as well as separate marriages for gays and lesbians will.

K, I stole this from Laura...but it looks like fun! Here we go!

[X] Cheated on someone else

And the truth shall set you free!
Bondage Bear

Which Dysfunctional Care Bear Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla

NNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Are you fuckin' serious?!?! I want to be the Slut bear like KB!! That's no fair...just because I'm a fag hag doesn't make me the GAY one... Its because I put ABBA isn't it... DAMN
Gay Bear

Which Dysfunctional Care Bear Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla

I don't want to walk to English. PROCRASTINATING!!

Maggie- great away message last night! Something along the lines of my ass being a spaceship and wanting to ride it....that's splendid!

Finally getting into the groove of being a college student again....with work on the weekend my homework is slowly piling up though...its a slippery slope I'm on....RAWRRRRR

ok, ok..I'm going to English!

What I've learned from this weekend:

If you don't want to/can't work then quit. Please stop making my life a living hell and making me pick up after you.

School and work are a bad combination.

School, work, and booze are a worse one.

Mondays come too quickly now.

Everyday feels like a Monday.

I repeat: Mother Nature is a big fat tease. Beautiful autumn weather Friday and then the weekend turns out to be bleck. C'mon now.

Iron Chef isn't shown on Saturdays at the same time it shows during the week. They show Iron Chef America. Horrifying.

I'll be 20 next month. I'm scared I will never accomplish anything because I have yet to accomplish anything thus far.

Travel has become more of a distant dream than a plusible idea. That's heartbreaking.

Homework time....I will be saying that for the next 4 years of my life. (Not happy about that)

WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO'S NAKKKKKKKKKEDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD?????? 

Oh yes. Yours truly is a typin away in Z NUDE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WHOW!!!!!!!! Ok..that's a lie...I'm in a towwel....but kindayeah!

COllege is gettin better. I'm super stressed about everythuing though but I have to pretend to not be because no ones cares.

I still don't have any friends here...my roomates aren;t very helpful in making things ok....they don't really care...KB doesn't like me anymore aas a friend...I guess that is ok and I have to pretend like I don't mind but deep down iside Its hurts everyday. My best frien is gone and I don't even know what I did. I'm a bad person like that.

Today is friday. I had to go to work for 8 hours. I am back at the candy store. I will never esscape the hell known as Fuzziwig's. I have a 12 hour shift tomorrow. It makes me hurt but I need the money. I spent so much money this past year on nothing at all.

JSH never calls me anymore. he stopped liking me too. 

What is going on? I'm not that horrible am I? do I have to pay people to be my friends? its ok..you can tell me...noothing shocks me anymore...

When you have nothing at alll you have nothing to lose.

I am so overwhelmed I want to dig a hole and die in it.

Between work, school, money (lack of), friends (lack of) I don't know if I can do this.

Day 3 and I want out.


Perhaps I'm not cut out for this college life.

Today has so far been a crappy day.

Woke up an 8. Had to be out the door by 8.30. Rushed in the shower and forgot to rinse of the conditioner. Deposited at work by 8.45 even though I don't open the store until 10 because my brother had to be at work early. I can't wait until he's gone.

Came into work and its FLOODED. No, literally FLOODED. There's an inch and a half of standing water wrapped around the counter...the Pepsi machine clogged up. Spent 45 minutes cleaning it up instead of trying to rinse my hair out.

If I ever get so pretentious as to feel my opinion is more important than ANYONE ELSE'S please shoot me.

Had a dream I was shot. It hurt, even in my dream. But then Maggie came and took me to her big Laguana Beach style house and we sat in the jacuzzi and Stephen (the hot guy from L. Beach) was there too. Yum. Maggie, is Laguana Beach a real place in California?

My parents and I had yet another knock down drag out. I realize if I just take the blame for it all it goes by quicker. It will be better in a month when I don't have to put up with their shit.

Another gym session tonight. Already bought my tickets to the gun show.

Mr. 88 acquired a casa over the past week. Nice place. Set on 10 acres. Pretty in the rain. Quiet. It will be a nice getaway during school.

I have no money. I love this. I spent so much of it that I turn around expecting it and its gone. I try to cook my books everyday to squeeze it all a little further...not happening...

10am. Time to open this shithole. This time in 2 weeks I'll have my keys to my own place. I can't move up there until Chris goes up because he has the car...but at least I'll have an escape.

Still have to work here 25 hours on weekends to stay afloat...not exciting.

Bleck. Make this day be better.

There were bullfrogs at Borders yesterday. Someone should really check the floorboards.

I need to start packing. Procrastinators of the world unite!!! ...tomorrow...

I've been feverishly reading NATIONAL GEOGRAPHICs for the past week. I found the one from October '85 (my birthday, folks)...about Arabia's Frankincense trail. Really interesting. I like how they its always printed as "South Yemen, the Marxist country"...don't see that one in print that much anymore, do ya?

Mr. 88 and I were talking about taking a motorcycle trip to Central America...after realizing the price of gas, the poor road conditions, and our lack of Spanish fluency, we are now toying with the idea of heading back to my second rumah- SE Asia. if we do go it'll be summer '07. Interesting idea....

Hot and muggy as all get out. Its 9am and its muggy. Gross...can we talk about this?

Haven't parited in a long time...all the craziness from the beginning of the year with the drinking and the parites and the hookups seem a million miles away.

What if God meant the Bible figuratively and not litterally? That Jonah and the whale is really an alegory? ..he'd probably be sittin' up there goin' "NO, no, no....its not a REEALLLLLLL whale! C'mon people! Have I taught you NOTHING!?!?" Hmmmmm...let your brain chew on that one for a while...

Haven't got my copy of the the Harry Potter Book OR seen Charlie & The Chocolate Factory. How am I ever going to hone my title of POP CULTURE PRINCESS if I keep this up?

My very 1st class on my very 1st day in college is 9am English 103. Its all the way on the other side of campus and I have NOOO idea how to get there. Even thinking about it RIGHT NOW makes me nervous...i'll be upchuckin from the butterflies by the Sunday before...it feels like I'm starting kidergarten all over again...only there are no lines with teachers at the front to lead you to your classrooms....I'm nervous...soooooo, if anyone knows how to get to Stevenson tower South from Lucinda, I'd love the advice.

Bathtub time!

I washed my hair this morning, didn't dry it, came to work, and now its slowly but surely freezing off! It was 68 when I came in here this morning...brrrrr

How do you keep a relationship with parents intact when you're moving out? I'm completely, 100% LOST on this one...Apparently now I'm arrogant and selfish (according to my Mumsy..) How? Beats me! But whatever I'm doing wrong, however I'm doing it, needs to STOP! Opp! Are you talking?! WRONG! Going out with your friends? WRONG! Breathing? WRONG! Me going out with my friends is no longer "Me going out with my friends" its "I'm leaving the house only to spite my mother so she'll feel horrible about her life"....WHAT?!?! Yeah, welcome to my world...menopause is a bitch.

Beyond that business I'm still trying to keep up with the gym...I finally feel like I've gotten over a hurdle and am making progress. I'm over that hating the gym segment of teh show and now look forward to the stress reliver everyday. Mr. 88 joined the gym too so its nice to share that...

The boss is on vacation and things at the store have gone down the drain. No one knows how to change the C02 tank..there's no cheese for cheese popcorn...everything is falling apart...bleck...I have to make it all work somehow...that's my speciality- "making it work".

Going with the girls to 6 Flags on the 3rd...sort of our last big hoopla before school. I get keys to my place on the 7th. I'm moving all my things there that day and (PRAY!!) by the 15th I'll be up there permenently...classes begin the 22nd. I'm a little nervous about that...can't even lie.

Alright, I'm going to get this day started. After work then its off to the gym, finding the floor in my room, and getting to bed before 11.

God bless it! And its only Tuesday!

Less than 6 weeks and I'm out...

This past year has been absolutely nuts. I've had wonderful times, great memories, crazy nights...lots of new people...new hook ups...new adventures...

But there has also been heartbreakingly lonely times and depression beyond comprehension and disappointment...

I've learned alot but I'm so ready to go to school and see if I still can write a paper. I'm ready to get out of this town again.

Summer is flying by...all these great things that we've planned haven't panned out. Lately I feel like having a boy has stopped my friends from calling as much because they assume I'm with him...that blows...I feel like I'm missing out on the fun, single life...the grass is always greener on the other side, I know.

He's a nice guy. He's a great guy. Is that enough? Me starting school in the Fall will defintely test our relationship. I don't know how well I'm going to be able to juggle 15 hours (3 of them Honors), 25 hours a weekend at Fuzziwig's to stay financially afloat, college social life and my need to be in the middle of it, family struggles, friendships, AND a boy. What have I gotten myself into?! Feast or famine, I tell ya.

London blasts this morning. Terrorists bombed 3 metro trains and a double decker. There are reports now saying the double decker was a suicide bomber. Honestly, what the hell are people thinking? How does BOMBING fix anything?! It dosen't earn respect from anyone; it only creates a hostile environment...good governers! What is this world coming to?!??! Its disgusts and saddens me in so many ways...

I will be 20 in October. 20 years old. I'll have pranced around on this lil globe for 20 years...wow. Talk about feeling completely unaccomplished, strangely old, and frightingly innocent (well..maybe not INNOCENT...) all at this same time...Like I told L the other day- either roll with the world or it'll roll right over you. Yeah, I just got rolled over...bitches...

Went down to the Taste this weekend. Fabulous amounts of fun! Ate alot of corny stuff! Danced in the fountain. Made out on a bridge and stopped traffic, yeah, that's hot! ;)

Rosemary, Heaven restores you in light.
You're coming with me.
Through the aging, the fear, and the strife.

Its the smiling on the package
Its the faces in the sand
Its the thought that holds you upwards
Embracing you with two hands

My, my, my...where will this world take me next? I pray I am smart and capable enough to make this all work. I really don't want the peak of my life to be a silly exchange when I was 16. I want to do more in my life than just that. I want to do something wonderful. I want to become someone great. I just want to be happy.

My gym routine is going well. I'm proud of myself for this one.

Orientation at NIU was fine. I'm going to pull an Anthro degree with a minor in SE Asian Studies on Honors in 4 years. Oh yes, its all planned out. Pray that I can see it through.

Today is my 2 month with Mr. 88. Amazing. I still get butterflies every time I see him. I'm such a girl.

No word from my friends. I swear that they have all moved to Madagascar and left no forwarding address...I'm tired of being hurt so now I'm just mad. You don't NOT return phone calls.... >(

Went to the Michigan Dunes over the weekend. It was a little cold but it was still a lot of fun.

Sitting at work...

My bruise from Six Flags now looks like a huge flower on the back of my leg...its purpley blue...matches my toes...good times...

2 hours of gym today after work. Tomorrow I'm going for yoga.

No more chocolate or candy for me. I'm going cold turkey!

Lordy, Lordy, Lordy. Summer is gettin' crazier by the day!

-Speeding ticket. Opps. Only 20mph over though. 
-Six Flags with KB, Clennors, Mr. 88, and Johann. Talk about fabulous great times! I've never laughed so hard riding on a tentecle before IN MY LIFE.
-Irony: Flashing a Milk truck. 
-I no longer sleep at home. My bed hurts my back. 
-"Boy Howdy" comes out of my mouth alot now...I don't know where that came from.
- Fuzziwig's Corporate will be in town next week. We're fucked in the ass. The store is no ways near ready. Its somehow become my responsibility. Bleck.
-NIU Orientation is tomorrow. I'd love to say I'm excited but I'm not. I don't really want to waste my day listening to people tout the Huskies. Hopefully I can at least register for classes and all the good stuff. 
-Mr. 88 picked me a rose from his garden this morning. :) No words. Still no words to describe this craziness.
-Bought a bikini at Hurricane Harbour. Who knew that less material could make your boobs look bigger? Meh


Time to find my floor, do some laundry (is that all I ever do anymore!?!), work out, and head the the store. Oh whatta day. Please let it fly by.

Joined Bally's with DJ. Its kicking my ass into shape like no other. Now that I'm financially and friendshiply obligated I think that I'll acutally get on the ball this time. We went for PowerFlex, cardio, and yoga yesterday. I spent 3 hours at a gym! Who woulda thought!? ;) We go back today for pilates and more cardio. I hope I don't loose my butt.

best feeling in the world: Waking up next to Mr. 88. Hands down.

I'm going to find DJ a boy this summer. He needs one. He needs a good one!

HOLLABACK GIRL!

Anyone seen Bad Education with Gael Bernal Garcia yet?? I have been desperately trying to hunt it down. *yum*

Cheers.queers.beers.

He bought me a ring.

He bought me a necklace.

He bought me dark chocolate covered strawberries.

No reason, no special day, just because.

I have never felt so beautiful in my entire life.

Summer has arrived!! All my friends are officially home from school and ready for a crazy fun-filled summer...if I could get a hold of them! RAWWRRRRR All of 'em have gone MIA! Its gonna be face on the milk carton time in 2 shakes!!! DON'T MAKE ME DO IT!!

On a side-note to my splendid man North of the border: Ok, Ok, see...I did update...but YOU never EVER EVER update yours!!! You've got all the lil tidbits of my life but I've NOTHIN' on you!! Mhmmm

Last night I fell asleep at Mr. 88's place...it was wonderful...wonderful to cuddle. I love being in his arms. LOVE IT!

Just drinkin' my overly sugared coffee and listening to bad 90's music...God Bless off days...

Just finished Siddhartha by Hermann Hesse...what a horrible translation of it I had (He's German)!!!! It read like a bad SEE SPOT RUN book...."Siddhartha feels love. Love Siddhartha, love." Guuuawwwww. So much is lost in translation...anyone ever see that movie?? What an amazing movie...you get this feeling from it...this alienated blur...I lived that feeling...it was surreal to see my feelings translated into a film. Wow wow wow.

WHOO HOOO! KB & I are going shopping and to get my hair cut!! YESSSSSSSSSSSSSSsssssssssssssssss

Hmmm...I better go find pants then....Dum dum dummmmmm

Why do I never seem to have/be able to find pants?????

RAWWRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!!

Today is a flustering day. My brother took my car today for his internship...I won't have it all summer. Its frustrating that he gets priority. 

I got super sunburned at the theme park yesterday in the Dells...forget sunkissed..I was sun raped...it hurts.

I'm sitting here at work on another Monday I orginally had off. Yes, that's 3 Monday's in a row I've had to come into this shit hole. 

The less time spent at home the better. Everyone is getting on my nerves. My litte brother is annoying, my older brother thinks he's God, my mother is menopausal, and my father is too far buried in the TV after work to know his left from his right. 3 months and I'm outta there...not like I'm really GOING anywhere though....20 minutes down the road to a school I didn't pick. That's not that exciting. The only truly exciting part is getting my OWN ROOM in an appartment with two fabulous chicas. I'm looking forward to that.

I am going to pay rent this year and hopefully be able to cover rent & tuition next year. The thought of having MommyDaddy pay for everything is sickening. I don't want to be my older brother.

Its so quiet in here I can hear the slurpy machine....

Mr. 88 is picking me up after work today...very ready to see him.... :D

I think the girls are mad at me but I'm not sure...I'm (sadly) not a mind-reader...meh...

I have really fun burn lines from this weekend...like the 2 marks on the side of my face from my sunglasses...yeah, that's hot.

I'm flustered because the ONE summer I'll probably have $$ and time to spend that $$ I have NO CAR!!! >(

Whatever...hopefully this day'll get better. Monday's aren't my best days.

This weekend is Memorial Day weekend..the store is gonna be nuts...the family is talking about going camping for the weekend which would be great because then I would have the house to myself. 

My only off day this week is tomorrow...I need it...

Alright, I've gotta open the store....bleck....

Beautiful days have arrived. 

I want orange juice. I would kill for orange juice.

Apple picking is amazing this season because I acutally have a few in my reach. ;)

I do want your peaches, I will shake your tree.

"So long & thanks for all the fish" -Hitchhikers's Guide to the Galaxy

I saw it last night with KB. Good stuff. It was refreshing to know that Douglas Adams, the author, also wrote the screenplay to the flick. I don't like it when directors take massive liberties with the books...keep it true to the pages people!!

My face hurts. This could become cronic. Mondays aren't my thing. I want to go to sleep and restart this blasted day...its not even 10 yet...I still have 8 hours of "WORK" before I can see my bed again. I won't say bleck again.
